name: ChillaxCare
0:
”Alexa, ask chillaxcare to tell temperature”
”Alexa, ask chillaxcare to play lullaby”
”Alexa, ask chillaxcare to play audiobook”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chillax care
Developer Terms of Use
des: Control your monitor by using Alexa with 5Gencare of Chillaxcare App. Use Alexa with your ChillaxCare account to manage your home and baby camera monitors. The official Alexa skill allows to select different monitor to check Temperature of monitor, play and stop lullabies from the monitor, play and stop audiobooks from the monitor, change speaker volume of monitor.
